segments.text: Good morning . I ’ d like to ask some questions about your insurance policies .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course . Please sit down . How can I help you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I bought a house recently and would like to insure it and its content .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I see . Here ’ s a pamphlet about our home insurance policy . We ’ Ve named our policy ” umbrella ” . May I ask how much you paid for your home and where you live ? These are the two main thing that decide how much your premiums are .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I understand . I live in the Oakfield area and paid $ 100,000 for my home .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let me just check that on my computer . Oakfield is a low risk area , so your premiums will probably be around $ 100 a month . The other thing to take into account is deductibles .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: In this pamphlet it says that the minimum amount for deductibles is $ 2000 . what does that mean exactly ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It means That the first $ 2000 of any claim you make must be paid by you . The insurance policy covers any amount above that , up to the agreed limit .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , I see . That ’ s fine . What is the advantage of having higher deductibles ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If you have higher deductibles , your premium are lower , because you will pay more of the claim and we will pay less .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It seems that I should do some calculations before deciding . I presume that the insurance period can be for as long as we agree .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We initially sign one-year policies with our policyholders . These are renewable after the first year .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If I have a claim , how long does it take to make a settlement ? I ’ Ve heard that with some insurance companies , it can take months .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That is of great concern to out clients . We aim to satisfy all claims within a month , but we can ’ t guarantee that
segments.speaker: S2
